comments.html:
Just ask Comcast about RFC1918 space exhaustion. This presentation is a little old but interesting none the less.

http://www.ripe.net/ripe/meetings/ripe-54/presentations/IPv6_management.pdf
comments.name: Jonathan

comments.html: Yeah, I know about Comcast. Their approach is well documented in the "Global IPv6 strategies" book. Thanks for the presentation link: it's always good to get the information straight from the source.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html:
Ivan

Still no customer is ready for ipv6. how to convince them.

comments.html: You don't. They'll adapt or wither.

comments.html: Comcast (Alain) expect to solve all their problems with CGN. Kind of disagree :)
